name: vanilla-nui
description: SPA mit vanilla JS und nativem UI (OnsenUI)

scripts.postinstall: cp node_modules/ionicons/dist/css/* node_modules/onsenui/css/ionicons/css/; cp node_modules/ionicons/dist/fonts/* node_modules/onsenui/css/ionicons/fonts/;
scripts.publish: npm run build:prod && gh-pages -d dist -b master -e vanilla-nui
